哱字的基本解释

哱
pò
吹气声。

哱
bā
〔哱拜〕鞑靼族的一支。亦称“巴拜”。

哱
bō
〔呼哱哱〕戴胜鸟的俗称。

哱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pò］
［《廣韻》普没切，入没，滂。］
(1)吹气声。参见“哱息”。
(2)见“哱囉”。
(3)助词。相当于“吧”。

哱字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　哱； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页190第31
【廣韻】【集韻】?普沒切，音馞。【廣韻】吹氣聲。　又【正字通】哱囉，軍器。【戚繼光·新書·號令篇】凡吹哱囉，是要衆兵起身，執器站立。　又【集韻】薄沒切，音孛。聲也。　又【類篇】亂也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?補妹切，音背。與誖同。亦亂也。或作悖，亦書作?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pò］
["Guang Yun" is not cut, enters, and pensive. ]
(1) Blowing sound. See "Quick Breath."
(2) See "哱啰".
(3) Particles. Equivalent to "bar".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　哱; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 190 31
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu hasn't cut, the sound is bad. [Guang Yun] Blowing sound.　[Zhengzitong] 哱啰, military weapon. 【Qi Jiguang·New Book·Command Article】Everyone who blows the croak is to get the soldiers to stand and hold the weapon.　[Jiyun] It’s thin and not cut, and it’s sound. Sound also.　[Classes] Chaos also.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Make up the girl and cut the sound back. Same with paradox. It's also chaotic. Or as a contradiction, also as a book?.
